pages.text: $(li)The Xaero's Map & Minimap will help you to don't be lost in this gigantic world.$(br)$(li)The Minimap will show you where are you, near terrain and surroundies creatures near you.$(br)$(li)The yellow dots represent neutral creatures and the red dots aggresive ones.
$(li)You can open the map pressing the M key.$(li)You are represented as a red arrow on the map.
$(li)In the up left corner you have a button to access the settings of the Xaero's Map and you can press the Y button to access the Minimap settings.

pages.title: Map Buttons
pages.text: $(br)In the lower right corner you can found four buttons:$(br)$(li)1. It shows you the Map Controls and Keybinds.$(br)$(li)2. Exports a picture in PNG of your actual Map.$(br)$(li)3. Turn On / Turn Off the creatures radar.$(br)$(li)4. Manage your Waypoints.

pages.title: Create Waypoints
pages.text: $(br)You can save your favourite positions in the map creating Waypoints.$(br)$(li)First press the B key in your keyboard.$(br)$(li)Then, configure the colour and the name of the waypoint and click in the Confirm button to create it.
$(li)Now in the Minimap and Map you can see the Waypoint created.
$(li)You can right click on the waypoint to edit, disable, share, or even remove it.
$(li)Now you will see the distance between you and your waypoint.
$(li)If you want to stop this, you can disable the waypoint in the Map interface.
